help_businesstype_giftshop_content:
**Gift Shops** are retail businesses. 

Customers are self-serving.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Stack of Shopping Baskets](furniture-stackofshoppingbaskets)
* [Point of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Gift (Cheap)](products-cheapgift)
* [Gift (Expensive)](products-expensivegift)
* [Flower (Cheap)](products-cheapflower)
* [Flower (Expensive)](products-expensiveflower)
* [Umbrella](products-umbrella)
* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)

And can additionally sell:

* [Arty Fish Smartwatch](products-smartwatch2)
* [Picture Book](products-picturebook)
* [Rhythm By Tre](products-headphones01)
* [ZanaMan Smartwatch](products-smartwatch1)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_itemname_stackofshoppingbaskets_con:
**Stack of Shopping Baskets** are required in all retail businesses where the customers grab their products themselves.

**Customer Capacity:** 30

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
help_itemname_cheapgift_content:
**Gift (Cheap)** is a type of product primarily sold from [Gift Shops](businesstypes-giftshop).

Additionally, it can be sold from:

* [Florists](businesstypes-florist)
* [Bookstore](businesstypes-bookstore)

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Rounded Shelf](furniture-roundedshelf)
* [Product Panel](furniture-productpanel)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Gift (Cheap) Recipe](recipes-cheapgiftrecipe)
help_itemname_roundedshelf_content:
**Rounded Shelf** can be used to sell:

* [Gift (Cheap)](products-cheapgift)
* [Gift (Expensive)](products-expensivegift)
* [Flower (Cheap)](products-cheapflower)
* [Flower (Expensive)](products-expensiveflower)

**Product Capacity:**
* Gifts: 200
* Flower (Cheap): 40
* Flower (Expensive): 25
**Customer Capacity:** 15

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
help_itemname_expensivegift_content:
**Gift (Expensive)** is a type of product primarily sold from [Gift Shops](businesstypes-giftshop).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Florists](businesstypes-florist).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Rounded Shelf](furniture-roundedshelf)

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Gift (Expensive) Recipe](recipes-expensivegiftrecipe)
help_businesstype_coffeeshop_content:
**Coffee Shops** are retail businesses. 

Customers are served by employees.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Cash Register](furniture-cashregister)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Croissant](products-croissant)
* [Cup of Coffee](products-cupofcoffee)
* [Cupcake](products-cupcake)
* [Donut](products-donut)

And can additionally sell:

* [Apple](products-apple)
* [Banana](products-banana)
* [Ice Cream](products-icecream)
* [Salad](products-salad)
* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)
 **Note:** A [Standing Digital Scale](furniture-standingdigitalscale) is required to sell Fruits and Vegetables.

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_fastfoodrestaurant_con:
**Fast-Food Restaurants** are retail businesses. 

Customers are served by employees.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Cash Register](furniture-cashregister)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Burger](products-burger)
* [Chicken Kabob Skewer](products-kabob)
* [French Fries](products-frenchfries)
* [Hotdog](products-hotdog)
* [Ice Cream](products-icecream)
* [Pizza](products-pizza)
* [Salad](products-salad)
* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)

And can additionally sell:

* [Apple](products-apple)
* [Banana](products-banana)
 **Note:** A [Standing Digital Scale](furniture-standingdigitalscale) is required to sell Fruits and Vegetables.

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_supermarket_content:
**Supermarkets** are retail businesses. 

Customers are self-serving.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Stack of Shopping Baskets](furniture-stackofshoppingbaskets)
* [Point of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Fresh Food](products-freshfood)
* [Frozen Food](products-frozenfood)
* [Ice Cream](products-icecream)
* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)

And can additionally sell:

* [Apple](products-apple)
* [Banana](products-banana)
* [Bottle of Wine](products-bottleofwine)
* [Carrot](products-carrot)
* [Croissant](products-croissant)
* [Cupcake](products-cupcake)
* [Donut](products-donut)
* [Lettuce](products-lettuce)
* [Pear](products-pear)
* [Tomato](products-tomato)
 **Note:** A [Standing Digital Scale](furniture-standingdigitalscale) is required to sell Fruits and Vegetables.

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_jewelrystore_content:
**Jewelry Stores** are retail businesses. 

Customers are self-serving.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Stack of Shopping Baskets](furniture-stackofshoppingbaskets)
* [Point of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Jewelry (Cheap)](products-cheapjewelry)
* [Jewelry (Expensive)](products-expensivejewelry)
* [Arty Fish Smartwatch](products-smartwatch2)
* [ZanaMan Smartwatch](products-smartwatch1)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_clothingstore_content:
**Clothing Stores** are retail businesses. 

Customers are self-serving.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Stack of Shopping Baskets](furniture-stackofshoppingbaskets)
* [Changing Room](furniture-changingroom)
* [Point of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Clothing (Classic Cheap Female)](products-classiccheapfemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Cheap Male)](products-classiccheapmaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Expensive Female)](products-classicexpensivefemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Expensive Male)](products-classicexpensivemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Cheap Female)](products-moderncheapfemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Cheap Male)](products-moderncheapmaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Expensive Female)](products-modernexpensivefemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Expensive Male)](products-modernexpensivemaleclothing)

And can additionally sell:

* [Jewelry (Cheap)](products-cheapjewelry)
* [Jewelry (Expensive)](products-expensivejewelry)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_liquorstore_content:
**Liquor Stores** are retail businesses. 

Customers are self-serving.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Stack of Shopping Baskets](furniture-stackofshoppingbaskets)
* [Point of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale)
* At least one product to sell (see below)

Businesses of this type primarily sell:

* [Beer](products-beer)
* [Bottle of Wine](products-bottleofwine)
* [Cigar](products-cigar)
* [Cigarette](products-cigarette)
* [Whisky](products-whisky)

And can additionally sell:

* [Margarita](products-margarita)
* [Martini](products-martini)
* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Customer Service](skill-customerservice)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_lawfirm_content:
**Law Firms** are office-based businesses. 

Customers are handled digitally and are not physically present in the buildings.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Computer Workstation](furniture-computerworkstation)

Businesses of this type can sell:

* [Lawyer Fee (Hourly)](fees-hourlylawyerfee)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Lawyer](skill-lawyer)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_businesstype_headquarters_content:
**Headquarters** are special businesses that can be set up in any office building.

This business type never serves any customers. Instead, it can seat all operational employees for an organization.

The business requires the following furniture to function:

* [Computer Workstation](furniture-computerworkstation)

Employees with the following skills can be assigned:

* [Purchasing Agent](skill-purchasingagent)
* [Logistics Manager](skill-logisticsmanager)
* [HR Manager](skill-hrmanager)
* [Headhunter](skill-headhunter)
* [Cleaning](skill-cleaning)
help_itemname_freshfood_content:
**Fresh food** is a type of product primarily sold from [Supermarkets](businesstypes-supermarket).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Industrial Fridge](furniture-industrialfridge)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [SeaSide Internationals](address: 2 pier)
help_itemname_frozenfood_content:
**Frozen Food** is a type of product primarily sold from [Supermarkets](businesstypes-supermarket).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Industrial Freezer (Small)](furniture-smallindustrialfreezer)
* [Industrial Freezer](furniture-industrialfreezer)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [SeaSide Internationals](address: 2 pier)
help_itemname_cheapjewelry_content:
**Cheap Jewelry** is a type of product primarily sold from [Jewelry Stores](businesstypes-jewelrystore).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Clothing Stores](businesstypes-clothingstore).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Jewelry Floor Showcase](furniture-jewelryfloorshowcase)

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Jewelry (Cheap) Recipe](recipes-cheapjewelryrecipe)
help_itemname_expensivejewelry_content:
**Expensive Jewelry** is a type of product primarily sold from [Jewelry Stores](businesstypes-jewelrystore).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Clothing Stores](businesstypes-clothingstore).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Jewelry Floor Showcase](furniture-jewelryfloorshowcase)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Jewelry (Expensive) Recipe](recipes-expensivejewelryrecipe)
help_itemname_pizza_content:
**Pizza** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Pizza Oven](furniture-pizzaoven)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Pizza Recipe](recipes-pizzarecipe)
help_itemname_frenchfries_content:
**French Fries** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Industrial Fryer Machine](furniture-industrialfryermachine)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [French Fries Recipe](recipes-frenchfriesrecipe)
help_itemname_burger_content:
**Burger** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Industrial Grill](furniture-industrialgrill)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Burger Recipe](recipes-burgerrecipe)
help_itemname_sodacan_content:
**Soda Can** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant) and [Supermarkets](businesstypes-supermarket).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Coffee Shops](businesstypes-coffeeshop) and [Electronics Stores](businesstypes-electronicsstore) and [Florists](businesstypes-florist) and [Gift Shops](businesstypes-giftshop) and [Liquor Stores](businesstypes-liquorstore) and [Night Clubs](businesstypes-nightclub).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Drinks Fridge](furniture-drinksfridge)
* [Drinks Fridge (Large)](furniture-largedrinksfridge)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)
* [SeaSide Internationals](address: 2 pier)
* [United Ocean Import](address: 3 pier)
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Soda Recipe](recipes-sodarecipe)
help_itemname_salad_content:
**Salad** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Coffee Shops](businesstypes-coffeeshop) and [Fruit and Vegetable Stores](businesstypes-fruitandvegetablestore).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Salad Bar](furniture-saladbar)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Salad Recipe](recipes-saladrecipe)
help_itemname_croissant_content:
**Croissant** is a type of product primarily sold from [Coffee Shops](businesstypes-coffeeshop).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Supermarkets](businesstypes-supermarket).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Bakery Showcase](furniture-bakeryshowcase)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Croissant Recipe](recipes-croissantrecipe)
help_itemname_cupofcoffee_content:
**Cup of Coffee** is a type of product primarily sold from [Coffee Shops](businesstypes-coffeeshop).

The product can be assigned to the following furniture:
* [Industrial Coffee Machine](furniture-industrialcoffeemachine)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Coffee Recipe](recipes-coffeerecipe)
help_itemname_cigar_content:
**Cigar** is a type of product primarily sold from [Liquor Stores](businesstypes-liquorstore).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Tobacco Shelf (Large)](furniture-tobaccoshelf1)
* [Tobacco Shelf (Medium)](furniture-tobaccoshelf2)
* [Tobacco Shelf (Small)](furniture-tobaccoshelf3)

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [United Ocean Import](address: 3 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Cigar Recipe](recipes-cigarrecipe)
help_itemname_bottleofwine_content:
**Bottle of Wine** is a type of product primarily sold from [Liquor Stores](businesstypes-liquorstore).

Additionally, it can be sold from [Supermarkets](businesstypes-supermarket).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Wine Shelf](furniture-wineshelf)

The product can be purchased from the following locations:
* [NY Distro Inc](address:37 1s)

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [United Ocean Import](address: 3 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Wine Recipe](recipes-winerecipe)
help_itemname_paperbag_content:
**Paper Bag** is a type of product used by [Points of Sales](furniture-itemgrouppointofsale).

Paper Bag is required to sell products from almost every retail business type.

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)
* [SeaSide Internationals](address: 2 pier)
* [United Ocean Import](address: 3 pier)
* [BlueStone Imports](address: 4 pier)
help_itemname_hotdog_content:
**Hotdog** is a type of product primarily sold from [Fast Food Restaurants](businesstypes-fastfoodrestaurant).

The product can be placed in the following furniture:
* [Hotdog Grill](furniture-hotdoggrill)

The product can be purchased from any [wholesale location](wholesalers-locations).

The product can be imported from the following locations:
* [JetCargo Imports](address: 1 pier)

The product can be manufactured using the following recipes:
* [Hotdog Recipe](recipes-hotdogrecipe)
help_itemname_industrialfryermachine_con:
**Industrial Fryer Machine** can be used to sell:

* [French Fries](products-frenchfries)

**Product Capacity:** 200
**Customer Capacity:** 30

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
*  [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
help_itemname_hotdoggrill_content:
**Hotdog Grill** can be used to sell:

* [Hotdog](products-hotdog)

**Product Capacity:** 100
**Customer Capacity:** 30

**Requires:** [Cabinet](furniture-cabinet)

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)

**Industrial Grill** can be used to sell:

* [Burger](products-burger)
* [Chicken Kabob Skewer](products-kabob)

**Product Capacity:** 
* Burger: 120
* Chicken Kabob Skewer: 80
**Customer Capacity:** 20

**Requires:** [Cabinet](furniture-cabinet)

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)

**Drinks Fridge** can be used to sell:

* [Soda Can](products-sodacan)

**Product Capacity:** 120
**Customer Capacity:** 20

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
help_itemname_industrialfridge_content:
**Industrial Fridge** can be used to sell:

* [Fresh Food](products-freshfood)

**Product Capacity:** 50
**Customer Capacity:** 20

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
help_itemname_smallindustrialfreezer_con:
**Industrial Freezer (Small)** can be used to sell:

* [Frozen Food](products-frozenfood)
* [Ice Cream](products-icecream)

**Product Capacity:**
* Frozen Food: 25
* Ice Cream: 150
**Customer Capacity:** 15

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
help_itemname_cashregister_content:
**Cash Register** is a special *employee station* that requires employees with [Customer Service](skill-customerservice) skill.

You can use Interior Designer to adjust the customer queue.

The furniture requires the following products to function:
* [Paper Bag](products-paperbag)

**Product Capacity:** 1000
**Customer Capacity:** 20

**Must be placed on one of the following:**

* [Cabinets](furniture-cabinet)
* [Cocktail Bar](furniture-cocktailbar)
* [Cocktail Bar (Wooden)](furniture-woodencocktailbar)

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
help_itemname_jewelryfloorshowcase_conte:
**Jewelry Floor Showcase** can be used to sell:

* [Jewelry (Cheap)](products-cheapjewelry)
* [Jewelry (Expensive)](products-expensivejewelry)

**Product Capacity:** 50
**Customer Capacity:** 15

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
help_itemname_industrialcoffeemachine_co:
**Industrial Coffee Machine** can be used to sell:

* [Cup of Coffee](products-cupofcoffee)

**Product Capacity:** 300
**Customer Capacity:** 30

**Requires:** [Cabinet](furniture-cabinet)

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:

**Bakery Showcase** can be used to sell:

* [Cupcake](products-cupcake)
* [Donut](products-donut)

**Product Capacity:** 100
**Customer Capacity:** 20

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:

**Salad bar** can be used to sell:

* [Salad](products-salad)

**Product Capacity:** 350
**Customer Capacity:** 20

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Square Appliances](address:16 4a)
help_itemname_clothingrack_content:
**Clothing Rack** can be used to sell:

* [Clothing (Classic Cheap Female)](products-classiccheapfemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Cheap Male)](products-classiccheapmaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Expensive Female)](products-classicexpensivefemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Classic Expensive Male)](products-classicexpensivemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Cheap Female)](products-moderncheapfemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Cheap Male)](products-moderncheapmaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Expensive Female)](products-modernexpensivefemaleclothing)
* [Clothing (Modern Expensive Male)](products-modernexpensivemaleclothing)

**Product Capacity:** 50
**Customer Capacity:** 10

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [AJ Pederson & Son](address:13 5a)
uncle_fred_tutorial_1: Hey, kid, I hope you're feeling better. Anyway, I talked with a friend of mine, Richard, he's kind of a big shot. Well, the bottom line is: he has a cheap apartment that you could probably afford. It's not much, but it'll do.
uncle_fred_tutorial_2: And I also transferred a couple of bucks to your bank account because I want to make sure you get something to eat. Okay. Promise me.
uncle_fred_tutorial_3: Kid. I've gone ahead and paid your first rent, but that's it, okay, you need to get out there and get a job. Anything at all. You just need a salary right now.
uncle_fred_tutorial_4: You got a job well done. You're a chip off the old block, just like your dad. I think he was probably just about your age when he started his first business. Look, if you need a loan to start something, I got a friend over at Jensen Capital. His name is Larry. That's who you ask for. And be sure to say hi from me your Uncle Fred. Okay?
uncle_fred_tutorial_5: You found the car. Good. Now, don't get any parking tickets. As I said earlier, it's time to pick up some stuff for your new store. You can use your new car or continue running around with the hand trucks. It's up to you.
uncle_fred_tutorial_6: Oh, very, very nice. Starting to look like a real store now. Next, we have to buy some things for you to sell. For the time being, you have to go to a wholesale store, but eventually down the road, you'll do a whole lot better by importing directly from a manufacturer or overseas.
uncle_fred_tutorial_7: Great work, kiddo. Now it's time to open up and start handling some cash, making some money. I'm crossing my fingers.
uncle_fred_tutorial_8: Well, look at you hustling around and stacking cash already. I tell you, your dad would have been so proud. I think it's time for your first hire. And don't forget to take that course at the Business Administration School so you know what you're doing. All right.
uncle_fred_tutorial_9: Well, look at who's the boss. You did a good job on that hire kid. I know having an employee takes a big cut out of what you're taking in, but it also gives you extra time. Time to start cleaning up these floors. Oh, man, they're a bit nasty.
uncle_fred_tutorial_free_car: So you're a gift shop owner now, huh? Yeah, very good. Very good. Now we've got some shopping to do. We'll get you some furniture and some really nice products to sell in there. And I also wanted to mention, I recently invested in a car dealership and we found kind of a wreck of a car in the workshop in the back, but it still runs. It's not much, but it's yours if you want it. The key is in the glove compartment.
uncle_fred_tutorial_11: Floors, looking good! Make sure you keep them clean. You don't want the customers walking around in a dirty store, okay. All right. Now back to business. Maybe it's time to start looking for other opportunities. By any chance, have you noticed that people, your customers, are looking for something to drink? How about stocking in a fridge or something like that with cans of soda? You can make some extra money on that.
uncle_fred_tutorial_12: There you go, kiddo. Continue listening to your customers and keep improving. Keep improving. And by the way, you know, you don't build an entire empire with just a gift shop, right? I think you should consider opening a new business. That said, you don't want to go rushing into something willy-nilly. You got to know what people want. There's an app for that. MarketInsider app. See what people are looking for.
uncle_fred_tutorial_13: Now, you know: in business we always research the market before we go into it, okay? Finally, before you start your next business, make sure you find a building with a high traffic index. Serving high demand products combined with an address seeing a lot of foot traffic means high revenue.
uncle_fred_tutorial_14: You got two businesses now, huh? Haha. I think that's what the media calls a serial entrepreneur. Very nice work. I'll let you get back to it and I'll catch up with you later, kid.
uncle_fred_tutorial_15: So did you get a call from the bank? They must be shocked to see what's happening with your account on the way it's growing. You should find yourself a nicer apartment and buy yourself some really nice furniture. You deserve it.
uncle_fred_tutorial_16: Hey, kid. I talked with a good friend yesterday. Name is Gary. He owns a drive in wholesale store down in the industrial area. They sell stuff in big chunks, but a lot cheaper. You should bring a car. It's too far to walk.
uncle_fred_tutorial_17:
Beautiful! Make sure to keep popularity high for all your businesses. Sometimes you might have to increase your marketing budget to gain the same results. The market changes every day.

I'm going to visit my vacation residence in Costa Del Sol. When I get back, I hope to see you have increased your daily income. It's time to take your empire to the next level, but we need more money first!
uncle_fred_tutorial_18: Hey, kid, you got to come see my new villa in Marbella. We'll drink some sangria together some day. It's amazing. Anyways, I'm glad to see you've figured out how to increase your profit. Our next move is all about cutting out the middleman, the wholesaler. We got to start importing our products ourselves.
uncle_fred_tutorial_19: Congratulations on your new headquarters! This is where the top employees of your organization will be seated. First, we have to start hiring. We need a Purchasing Agent to help us secure some import contracts.
uncle_fred_tutorial_20: Ahh, progress! Your first operational employee working from your brand new headquarters. Starting to sound pretty fancy, huh? Now we need to get your purchasing agent working. But first, we need a place to store all your imported products.
uncle_fred_tutorial_21: This is excellent. We'll use this warehouse to store your products until we can get them into your stores. We'll get back to that later. But now let's start stocking up these beautiful new shelves.
uncle_fred_tutorial_22: So your warehouse is just jammed with products. We're at the last part, getting that stuff out of your warehouse and into your stores. So let's get busy.
uncle_fred_tutorial_23: You're doing great, kid. I am very impressed. In fact, I think I should back off a little bit, give you more space so you can continue building up your retail empire on your own.
tutorial_2_objective_2: Place the fridge in your apartment
tutorial_2_objective_3: Go to <b>El Gato<b> and buy at least 3 units of fresh food
tutorial_2_objective_4: Stock up fridge with fresh food
tutorial_3_objective_2: Continue working until you have earned $300 from your new job
help_itemname_wineshelf_content:
**Wine Shelf** can be used to sell:

* [Bottle of wine](products-bottleofwine)

**Product Capacity:** 72
**Customer Capacity:** 10

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Essentials Appliances](address:16 11s)
tutorial_5_objective_1: Buy a <u>cabinet</u>, a <u>cash register</u>, a <u>stack of shopping baskets</u> and a <u>rounded shelf</u> from <b>AJ Pederson & Son<b>
tutorial_5_objective_2: Place the cabinet and the cash register on top in your store
tutorial_5_objective_3: Place the stack of shopping baskets in your store
tutorial_5_objective_4: Place the round shelf in your store
tutorial_6_objective_1: Buy a box of Cheap Gifts and a box of Paper Bags from Metro Wholesale.
tutorial_6_objective_2: Stock up the rounded shelf with Cheap Gifts
tutorial_6_objective_3: Stock up the cash register with Paper Bags
tutorial_7_objective_1: Open the store using the BizMan app
tutorial_7_objective_2: Start working at the cash register
tutorial_8_objective_2: Start a recruitment campaign for Customer Service employees at Anderson Recruitment Corp.
tutorial_8_objective_3: Use the BizMan Schedule to assign the employee to the cash register for each day you want them to work.
tutorial_9_objective_1: Buy a cleaning station from Square Appliances
tutorial_9_objective_2: Place the cleaning station in your gift shop
tutorial_free_car_objective_1: Pick up the Honza Mimic at Uncle Fred's Car Dealership
tutorial_11_objective_1: Ensure $8,000 in your bank account (by saving or talking to the bank again)
tutorial_11_objective_3: Buy a box of Soda Cans from Metro Wholesale
tutorial_11_objective_4: Place the drinks fridge in your store
tutorial_11_objective_5: Fill up the drinks fridge with Soda Cans
tutorial_13_objective_1: Find and rent a retail building with a traffic index of at least {trafficIndex} and set the business type to "Fast Food Restaurant"
tutorial_14_objective_1: Generate a daily profit of {moneyAmount} per business
tutorial_15_objective_1: Visit the drive-in store, NY Distro Inc
tutorial_16_objective_1: Run a marketing campaign for one of your businesses
tutorial_16_objective_2: Reach a marketing level of 70% for one of your businesses
tutorial_17_objective_1: Generate a total profit of {moneyAmount} in one day
tutorial_18_objective_2: Open a headquarters in your new office building
tutorial_19_objective_2: Buy a <u>computer</u>, a <u>desk</u> and a <u>chair</u> from Mr. Scott's Office Supplies
tutorial_19_objective_3: Place the desk in your headquarters and attach the computer and the chair to the desk
tutorial_19_objective_4: Assign the Purchasing Agent to the workstation
tutorial_20_objective_2: Buy at least one pallet shelf
tutorial_20_objective_3: Place pallet shelf in your warehouse
tutorial_21_objective_1: Setup an import partnership with JetCargo Imports
tutorial_21_objective_2: Order batch of at least 1000 Cheap Gifts and 600 Soda Cans through the Purchasing Agent screen of your headquarters (BizMan)
tutorial_21_objective_3: After receiving the imported goods, verify 1000 Cheap Gifts and 600 Soda Cans are in your warehouse
tutorial_22_objective_1: Buy a UMC Desert van at the Truck Dealership
tutorial_22_objective_2: Drive the van to your warehouse and assign it to a slot
tutorial_22_objective_5: Assign the Logistics Manager to a free workstation in your headquarters (can be purchased from Mr. Scott's Office Supplies)
tutorial_22_objective_6: Assign the Delivery Driver to the van in your warehouse
tutorial_22_objective_7: Setup your gift shop as a destination in the Logistics Manager screen of your headquarters (BizMan)
tutorial_22_objective_8: Set the minimum stock count of your gift shop to at least 200 Cheap Gifts and 100 Soda Cans
help_itemname_wallmountedtvstand_content:
**Wall Mounted TV Stand** is a decorative item that can be placed in a home or business.

The furniture can be purchased from the following locations:
* [Ika Bohag](address:50 4s)
